title: OCE Fan Art Contest Results?

embed.description: http://i.imgur.com/kznPoIN.jpg Salutations! Last month Riot OCE hosted a FanFiction contest - and much to our surprise and enjoyment - the contest was flooded with hundreds of quality stories. Somehow, with the community’s assistance, we were able to award five authors for their

body: Does anybody know when the results will be coming out?

replies.body:
"The Winners will be announced September 30th!"

No doubt they were referring to NA time zones...
that explains not being able to submit something on the deadline(25th) too
Sorry about the delay its up! http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/RAI5FJKp-fanfiction-fanart-winners
10pm and im still waitin' - probs be up tomorrow morning
